name: BrickBrecan
description:
Source URL: https://github.com/Tequila-Mockingbird-Chevaliers/pygameSummerJam

A Brick Breaker and Space Shooter inspired indie game, made with Python and pygame for the Pygame Community Summer Team Jam 2021.

A simple, yet fun remake of a classic game. We hope you enjoy!

The GameDev Team

Tequila Mockingbird Cavaliers
